criteria.inclusion_criteria: severe ocular surface disease, such as chemical and thermal burn，severe corneal infection, Stevens-Johnson syndrome
criteria.exclusion_criteria: 1. The chronic stage of severe ocular surface diseases, such as symblepharon，corneal conjunctivalization, corneal scarring; 2. Pregnancy patients.

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: vision;cornea fluorescein staining;slit lamp photography;the detection of inflammatory cytokines;

secondary_outcome.sec_outcome: ultrasound biomicroscopy（UBM）;IOP（intraocular pressure）;schirmer test;tear film break-up time;optical coherence tomography（OCT);impression cytology;
